sections.comment:
Instrument Sound Data
=====================

Each "instrument" is a lookup table of duty/volume/envelope values that are
read backwards from the end

The normal version of an instrument is 64 bytes
The shorter version of an instrument is 23 bytes
sections.htmlComment:
Instrument Sound Data

Each "instrument" is a lookup table of duty/volume/envelope values that are read backwards from the end

The normal version of an instrument is 64 bytes The shorter version of an instrument is 23 bytes
